level.heading: Eligibility for license renewal.
level.text: Applicants licensed under the waiver provisions of this subchapter shall be eligible for license renewal on the same terms as all other licensed respiratory care practitioners.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-203
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-203, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 3-1201.01.
